column3:
Adds proxy-vole as a dependency to enable proxy pac usage.
http://code.google.com/p/proxy-vole/wiki/UsageExamples
An extra tick box has been added in the settings to enable using the feature

This looks good in general. It'll need some additional changes to be properly integrated into our build (such as specifying the license for the proxy-vole library), but we'll take care of it ourselves.

Have you signed the contributor agreement? If not, could you please do so?
http://www.jetbrains.org/display/IJOS/Contributor+Agreement
I've committed a change based on the pull request.
